personalNotes: Phase 2: Google Calendar Integration where selecting a time from the dropdown (Tomorrow, This Week, Next Week) automatically books the task to your Google Calendar, and Phase 3: Mark Done + Completion Tracking where you can click a button to mark tasks as complete (whether scheduled or not), which updates the visual state and syncs everything to your notes.json file. These two phases will cost approximately 5-6 more Manus credits and take 3-4 hours of Manus work to complete the entire automated scheduling system you envisioned.

personal.content: Phase 2: Google Calendar Integration where selecting a time from the dropdown (Tomorrow, This Week, Next Week) automatically books the task to your Google Calendar, and Phase 3: Mark Done + Completion Tracking where you can click a button to mark tasks as complete (whether scheduled or not), which updates the visual state and syncs everything to your notes.json file. These two phases will cost approximately 5-6 more Manus credits and take 3-4 hours of Manus work to complete the entire automated scheduling system you envisioned.
